definitions.text: the branch of medical science that treats disease or injury by operative procedures
examples: he is professor of surgery at the Harvard Medical School

definitions.text: a room where a doctor or dentist can be consulted
examples: he read the warning in the doctor's surgery

definitions.text: a room in a hospital equipped for the performance of surgical operations
examples: great care is taken to keep the operating rooms aseptic

definitions.text: a medical procedure involving an incision with instruments; performed to repair damage or arrest disease in a living body
examples: they will schedule the operation as soon as an operating room is available
